articles.title: Healthy Prenatal Diet Linked to Lower Autism Risk - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A new study suggests that a healthy prenatal diet may lower the risk of autism and social communication difficulties in children, according to researchers who analyzed data from two large cohort studies in Norway and the UK.

articles.title: Women with endometriosis face fourfold higher risk of ovarian cancer, study suggests - CNN
